name: Mankulam Purushothaman Namboothiri
shortTagline: A Legacy of Five Decades in Vedic Wisdom and Ritual Excellence
description: With a profound spiritual journey spanning over 50 years, Purushothaman Namboothiri is a distinguished Namboothiri priest and astrologer rooted in the rich traditions of Kerala. For the past 32 years, he has been a pillar of the spiritual community in Chembur, Mumbai, serving devotees across India and worldwide.
chiefPriest: Former Melshanthi (Chief Priest) at Chembur Shell Colony Ayyappa Temple (1993-2000)
